root.description: This dungeon cell is wet and cramped and dark.

exit.description: A rotting, wooden door hang on rope hinges.
exit.detailedDescription: Torchlight shines through the doorway. You can hear nothing outside.

prop.description: The walls of the room are of dirt.
prop.detailedDescription: The dirt walks are cold and wet. They ooze dark water at your touch.

prop.description: Crushed bones lay about the ground.
prop.detailedDescription: Many of the bones are splintered or crushed to nearly a powder. Other larger bones appear to have been gnawed by thin, sharp teeth.
